attributes.action: Hold a referendum to judge whether confidence has been lost in the European treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since this labour governments decision to qualify the EU treaty as entirely different from the constitution on which they said they would hold a referendum the trust of the people of the United Kingdom in politicians has deteriorated.
Setting an agenda for a referendum could in some way allow trust to be restored providing the government acted on the wishes of the people.
Unfortunately the granting of a referendum would not in itself restore the trust so eroded by this government but may be used as a first step.
